command_start:
Let's set the weather! 🌦

Write the full name of the city or part of it:
command_help:
I'm showing the weather information for the selected city. 🌦

The information is updated automatically every 3 hours.

To set the weather, press /start

To stop bot and delete all your data, press /stop
command_stop:
‚ùå All your data has been deleted.

In order to start the bot again, press /start
